title: Understanding TEACCH
text: The TEACCH approach is a structured teaching method designed to support individuals with autism. It focuses on adapting the environment to the needs of the individual.

title: Breaking Down TEACCH
text: TEACCH stands for Treatment and Education of Autistic and Related Communication-Handicapped Children. It emphasizes visual learning and structured environments.

hintAnswer: Treatment and Education of Autistic and Related $$Communication-Handicapped$$ Children
title: Identifying the Correct Expansion
text: Which of the following is the correct expansion of TEACCH?
choices: Treatment and Education of Autistic and Related $$Communication-Handicapped$$ Children
Treatment and Education of Autistic and OtheR $$Communication-Handicapped$$ Children
Teaching and Education of Autistic and Related $$Communication-Handicapped$$ Children
